皓.definition: (bound form) bright; luminous; white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)

皓首.definition: white head of hair; fig. old person

皓首蒼顏.definition: white hair and gray sunken cheeks (idiom); decrepit old age

皓齒.definition: white teeth (symbol of youth and beauty)

皓齒明眸.definition: white teeth and bright eyes (idiom); lovely young woman

皓齒硃唇.definition: white teeth and vermilion lips (idiom); lovely young woman
